actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making an appropriation to the Secretary of the Army for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976, and the transitional period ending September 30, 1976, to clear the main channel of the Little Calumet River, Ill., from its confluence with the Calumet-Sag channel eastward to the Indiana State line, of fallen trees, roots, and other debris and objects.

summary.text: Makes an appropriation of $290,000 to the Secretary of the Army for fiscal year 1976, and the transitional period ending September 30, 1976, to clear, acting through the Corps of Engineers, the main channel of the Little Calumet River, Illinois, from its confluence with the Calumet-Sag Channel eastward to the Indiana State line, of fallen trees, roots, and other debris and objects.

titles.title: A bill making an appropriation to the Secretary of the Army for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1976, and the transitional period ending September 30, 1976, to clear the main channel of the Little Calumet River, Ill., from its confluence with the Calumet-Sag channel eastward to the Indiana State line, of fallen trees, roots, and other debris and objects.
